options.title: On your marks...
options.headline: On your marks...
options.summary: Being quick off the mark can make all the difference in the Olympics. Can you compete with professionals? Blah blah. Blah.
options.tweetText: I got a reaction time of $TIME in the $EVENT. Can you do better? $URL

levels.name: Omnium time trial
levels.intro: Cyclists have an easy ride: five low beeps followed by a high-pitched starter tone.

levels.name: 50m freestyle
levels.intro: In swimming, a lifeguard waits for everyone to stop moving before saying "beep".

levels.name: 100m sprint
levels.countdownInstruction: Marks, set, and wait for the gun
levels.intro: In track events, the starter signal is a gun, usually filled with blanks.
